programme.desc: When an early addition of P T Barnums autobiography shows up in the shop, will Rick be a sucker and pay too much for the famous hoaxers tell-all?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Dont get fooled at the pawn shop when a seller hands Chumlee a thirty dollar bill. Will this curious cash have Chum reaching for his wallet to buy it?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Theres an air of betrayal at the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop when a super rare ancient Roman Ides of March coin comes into the shop. Chumlee goes post-apocalyptic over an original Mad Max movie poster.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The guys are knocked out the park when a drive to LA promises a peek at Babe Ruths called shot bat. Will Rick take a swing at the behemoth of all baseball treasures or get fanned by a fake?

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Its game on when a Donkey Kong penny bank from the early 1980s barrels into the store. Will this seller collect some extra coins, or will it be game over?

programme.desc: Tasked with retrieving a classified file, the mercenary Black Cougar assembles a squad of elite warriors to embark on this perilous mission.

programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Confession Of Pain

programme.desc: Lesotho TV caters for all age groups in the mountain kingdom, from serious to light-hearted content covering development, socio-economic, cultural, religious, sports and entertainment issues.

programme.title: There Are No Saints
programme.desc: A gritty, action-packed revenge thriller. After being released from jail, a former hitman is forced to revert to his old ways to save his son and avenge his wifes murder.

programme.title: Sam Jay: Salute Me Or Shoot Me
programme.desc: Comedian and writer Sam Jay takes the stage for a hilariously frank discussion on embracing our differences, the stresses of long-term relationships, and the power of empathy.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: A dark and twisty psychological thriller. A woman in an abusive relationship reaches out to her estranged friend with an unexpected, life-altering proposition.

programme.title: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: A suspenseful thriller. A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Surprised By Oxford
programme.desc: A compelling faith-based romance based on a memoir by Carolyn Weber. When Caro arrives at Oxford to pursue a PhD, an unexpected friendship opens her to mystery, vulnerability, and love.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial
programme.desc: The late Oscar-winning director William Friedkin adapts Herman Wouks Pulitzer Prize-winning novel. A young lieutenant is accused of a mutiny against his captain.

programme.title: Chickenhare and The Hamster Of Darkness
programme.desc: An epic adventure animation adapted from Chris Grines comic book series. Chickenhare embarks on an adventure to stop his uncle from overthrowing his father, King Peter.

programme.title: Camp Hideout
programme.desc: A troublesome crime comedy. After a teen steals an important item from two big-city goons, he hides in a church summer camp and must protect his newfound friends.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: This touching film, led by Pierce Brosnan, is inspired by the true story. A WWII veteran escapes his nursing home to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings in France.

programme.title: White Bird
programme.desc: This moving book-inspired film is the sequel to Wonder (2017). Struggling at his new school, former bully Julian gets a visit from his grandmother, who shares a story of her past.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Blake Lively leads this compelling, emotional film adaptation of Colleen Hoovers novel. A woman finds herself reliving her childhood trauma when she falls for a charming neurosurgeon.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A thrilling action film starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman. When a tech blogger finds a time-altering ring, he uses it to exact revenge on an evil pharmaceutical company.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars and directs this thriller about redemption. A contract killer with dementia is offered a chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: Marked Men: Rule Shaw
programme.desc: Opposites attract in this romantic drama. Two different people are attracted to each other, but after a night, neither can forget, they are worried it might destroy their love.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: A riveting premiere. Former nurse-turned-exotic animal broker Tonia Haddix fights to retain custody of her kids, seven chimpanzees at the Missouri Primate Foundation.

programme.title: State Of Consciousness
programme.desc: A gripping drama thriller. When an investment broker learns the power of hypnosis, he uses this skill to get what he wants, leading him to something he didnt see coming.

programme.title: She Is Love
programme.desc: An unexpected love story that sees old flames rekindle as a divorced couple unexpectedly cross paths at a country inn.

programme.title: Wild, Wild Space
programme.desc: A high-stakes HBO doccie that chronicles the modern-day, celestial land grab in which companies compete to blast satellite-carrying rockets into low Earth orbit.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: In this military action, Megan Fox takes up arms to fight for survival as she leads a band of mercenaries on a risky mission to rescue abducted girls in Africa.

programme.title: Cut-Out Girls
programme.desc: Cut-Out Girls is the story of how six young womens lives are altered by the actions of two aspiring sportsmen.

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A gripping conspiracy thriller. When a disgraced journalist turns to podcasting to salvage her career, she uncovers a strange conspiracy theory.

programme.title: Million To One
programme.desc: Love, self-discovery and family are at the core of this rom-com. A social media rising star returns home for a wedding, only to go from family liability to saviour.

programme.title: The Road To El Dorado
programme.desc: A fun animated adventure for the whole family. Two fun-loving crooks find the mythical city of gold populated by an ancient group of people who start treating them like Gods.

programme.title: Hashtag Proposal
programme.desc: A charming and enjoyable romcom. A fake marriage proposal between two strangers goes viral, and all the attention helps them with their struggling businesses.

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: If you like dance films, this sequel to the hit movie is just for you. Released from juvenile detention, a talented dancer joins a new dance crew.

programme.title: Girl You Know Its True
programme.desc: This is a fascinating music biopic about the music duo Milli Vanilli, who rose to fame in the late 80s and early 90s only to come crashing down after their secret is exposed.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake are back for another musical adventure. As Queen Poppy and Branch, they are on a quest to save all the Troll kingdoms from a power-hungry ruler.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Contemporary and fun, this acclaimed rom-com sees native New Yorker Rachel Chu head to Singapore to meet her boyfriends family, who, unbeknownst to her, are all super-rich elites.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: The late Whitney Houston stars as a pop star who is assigned a bodyguard (Kevin Costner) after receiving threats. At first, they butt heads but soon become dependent on each other.

programme.title: Joker Folie A Deux
programme.desc: A match made in madness as Lady Gaga joins Joaquin Phoenix to create a potent sequel of music and chaos. Struggling with his dual identity, Arthur meets the love of his life in prison.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Channing Tatum returns for a raunchy sequel to the hit film. This time, a down-and-out Mike and his crew travel across the country to participate in a national stripping contest.

programme.title: Sheroes
programme.desc: An adrenaline-fueled action film. Four friends on vacation in Thailand unleash their unique set of skills to fight for survival against a notorious drug lord.

programme.title: Safehouse
programme.desc: An intense action thriller. After Carlas brother is murdered, she goes on the run and becomes trapped in a cat-and-mouse game with the CIA, the government and the cartel.

programme.title: Falling For A Killer
programme.desc: A gripping thriller. When an Assistant DA visits her estranged parents country house to meet her sisters fiance, shes suspicious and convinced that hes a danger to her family.

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Naomi Watts finds herself in a desperate race against time in this tense thriller. A recently widowed mother tries her utmost to reach her son when a shooting occurs at his school.

programme.title: A Marriage Made In Heaven
programme.desc: An uplifting faith-based romcom. A talk show host is granted a chance to relive one week of his life.

programme.title: Ask Me To Dance
programme.desc: In this romcom, Tom Malloy and Briana Evigan play Jack and Jill, who are both unlucky in love. They separately meet a fortune teller who predicts they will find love before the year ends.

programme.title: Charlie And The Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Based on the popular childrens novel, Johnny Depp stars as the eccentric candy maker who leads a group of young children on a tour through a fantastical chocolate factory.

programme.title: Breaking Point
programme.desc: An edgy, dynamic UK dance film. Two estranged teenage brothers, gifted at breakdancing, try out together for the British breakdancing team to compete in the World Championships.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 2002 hit My Big Fat Greek Wedding, the revelation of a family secret and an even bigger, fatter wedding brings the Portokalos family together again.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: The talents of Oscar winner Meryl Streep and Amanda Seyfried tell the tale of a bride-to-be looking for her real father through the music of iconic 70s pop group ABBA.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An epic, star-studded first instalment in a two-part adaptation of the Broadway hit. A young woman with green skin forms an unlikely but profound friendship with a popular young woman.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A musical twist on a modern classic. A new student is a hit with an A-list girl clique called the Plastics. However, everything changes when she falls for the wrong guy.

programme.title: Beautiful Wedding
programme.desc: Dylan Sprouse stars in this romcom. After a crazy night in Las Vegas, Abby and Travis discover they are married. They head to Mexico for a honeymoon with friends and family.

programme.title: You Cant Run Forever
programme.desc: Oscar winner J.K. Simmons leads this suspenseful survival thriller. A teen suffering from anxiety becomes the target of a serial killer who chases her through the woods.

programme.title: The Aviary
programme.desc: A thought-provoking, chilling psychological thriller. Two women flee into the New Mexican desert to escape an insidious cult. However, they feel its leader is following them.

programme.title: The Devils Light
programme.desc: A mystery-filled horror. A Catholic nun believes she is answering a calling to be the first female exorcist - but who or what called her?

programme.title: Hard Home
programme.desc: A vengeful mother becomes the hunter in this gripping thriller. She lures her daughters killer into her smart home for a twisted game of revenge.

programme.title: Legend Of La Llorona
programme.desc: A terrifying story about a holiday horror. A couple vacationing in Mexico fights to save their son from La Llorona, the evil spirit blamed for numerous missing children.

programme.title: Redeemed
programme.desc: After becoming the youngest female minority judge elevated to the bench in her state, Angela Sylvester quickly finds herself trapped in a prison scam orchestrated by her boss.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Tom Hanks leads an all-star cast in this Oscar-winning film about three astronauts who desperately try to return to Earth after a routine space mission goes wrong.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black enters the mystic world of martial arts in this animated adventure. An obese, mild-mannered panda is thrown into the middle of a battle for the fate of China.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A Viking teenager being trained to fight dragons encounters and ultimately befriends one of the flying fire-breathers.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Adam Sandler leads this hilarious remake of the 1974 prison sports comedy. An ex-NFL player sent to prison is forced to form a team of convicts to play football against the guards.

programme.title: Sweet N Short
programme.desc: Coping with change is at the heart of this film. After winning big at a casino, a man is knocked unconscious and stays in a coma for 20 years, waking up to a new South Africa.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Gerard Butler returns for the third instalment of this action-packed franchise. Mike Banning is on the run after he is framed for the attempted assassination of the President.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: Gerard Butler leads a great ensemble cast in this action thriller. A wily con artist running from an assassin devises a scheme to hide inside a small-town police station.

programme.title: Tsotsi
programme.desc: Presley Chweneyagae drives this poignant Oscar-winning drama. The life of a young criminal, Tsotsi, is changed forever when he finds a baby in the back seat of a car he stole.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: Dave Bautista fights for his family in this action film. After his niece is kidnapped by deadly terrorists, an ex-soldier is forced to wage a one-man war against them.

programme.title: American Carnage
programme.desc: A political horror wrapped in satirical comedy. After children of undocumented immigrants are arrested, the detainees are given a chance to volunteer to care for the elderly.

programme.title: Unstoppable: The Rebecca Nagel Story
programme.desc: This incredible documentary tells the story of Rebecca Nagel, whose car accident left her an L1 paraplegic. She became the first female to complete a half marathon trail event.

programme.title: Arranged Love
programme.desc: A delightful romcom about a woman who left an arranged marriage and inheritance in India and began her own company. But when a problem threatens it, marriage is the solution.

programme.title: The Great Holiday Bake War
programme.desc: This movie is a recipe for love. Julian and Brianna, old rivals from baking school, meet again in a TV competition, having separate plans on how to win.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Award-winning actors Julia Roberts and Clive Owen star in this thriller. Two ex-government agents working for rival companies plan to double-cross their employees.

programme.title: Spud 3: Learning To Fly
programme.desc: The third instalment of the South African tale follows a now sixteen-year-old Spud Milton (Troye Sivan) who must navigate the difficulties of being a senior at boarding school.

programme.title: Epic Tails
programme.desc: An adventure animation about friendship, bravery, and teamwork. Assisted by ageing hero Jason and the Argonauts, a mouse and a cat try to save their Greek city from the wrath of Poseidon.

programme.title: Fathers Day
programme.desc: Two men discover that a woman lied to them both about being the father of her child. They go on a road trip in search of her runaway son to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star in this great comedy about family. A couple bites off more than they can chew when they adopt three foster children.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: This absorbing drama earned Denzel Washington another Oscar nomination for his portrayal of a deeply conflicted - but gifted - commercial pilot.

programme.title: The Dive
programme.desc: A terrifying deep-water thriller. Two sisters go diving at a remote location. One of the sisters is struck by a rock, leaving her trapped 28 meters below, fighting for her life.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, widower Justin Quayles quest for answers leads him to explosive secrets.

programme.title: Vampires House Of Cain
programme.desc: A fanged crime thriller. A detective investigating a series of murders is caught in a war between two Vampire clans.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: Danger is all around in this treacherous adventure filled drama. A climber ascends the one of the worlds biggest mountains, K2 to save his sister, who is trapped at the top.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: Jon Stewart delivers a political satire. A retired colonels viral video grabs the attention of a Democrat strategist, who pushes the colonel to run for mayor of a small town.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Colin Farrell takes centre stage in this dark crime comedy. After a job gone wrong, two Irish hitmen are told to lay low in Belgium, but they find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: Nightmare Pageant Moms
programme.desc: A riveting thriller. A financially struggling mother and daughter enter a mother-daughter beauty pageant that could pay for her childs college. But things are not as they seem.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion Of The Cimarron
programme.desc: This Oscar nominee for Best Animated Feature film sees a young mustang stallion become the leader of his herd. But when he is captured, hes forced to fight for his freedom.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: While trying to evade capture by Gargamel, the Smurfs find themselves in the altogether new surroundings of New York City.

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson (The Hunger Games) has an unforgettable adventure in this fantasy film about a boy and his uncle who take a thrilling trip beneath the earths surface.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Kandasamys: The Wedding
programme.desc: The madness continues in this sequel to the hit South African rom-com. It is a week before Jodi and Prishens wedding and their love is tested as the family interfere once more.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: The Hitmans Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Sam Jackson dive headfirst into action for this chaotic comedy. A low-level bodyguard reluctantly agrees to protect a crazy hitman with valuable testimony.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: This stunning drama was nominated for eleven Oscars. Whoopi Goldberg leads an all-star cast in this story of one womans journey of survival and triumph through adversity.

programme.title: Killing Field
programme.desc: Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veterans life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.

programme.title: Autumn In The City
programme.desc: An enjoyable romance film about Piper, who moves to New York City to find herself. There, she meets Austin, a jaded writer, and they discover the citys beauty together.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Our Almost Completely True Story
programme.desc: A sincere and hilarious love story. A short Jewish man pursues a tall, ageing Hollywood star.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: Thapelo Mokoena and Jennifer Freeman are the heartbeats of this film. After Riley learns Mandla is a prince while visiting his family, he must try to regain her trust and love.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Emily Blunt drives this quirky rom-com set across a beautiful Irish landscape. Two star-crossed lovers become entangled in a land dispute between their families.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Russell Brand drives this remake of an 80s classic. A rich playboy must choose between a marriage that will ensure his lavish lifestyle or a financially uncertain future with his true love.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A touching film. After rescuing a dolphin from a trap, a boy learns that the animals tail must be amputated, prompting him to convince a marine biologist to devise a solution.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: A great ensemble cast shows that youre never too old to follow your dreams. A group of elderly women from a retirement community form a cheerleading squad and enter a competition.

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars alongside Viola Davis, who earned an Oscar for her role. This 50s drama navigates the complex relationship of a working-class African-American family.

programme.title: Midnight In The Switchgrass
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and Megan Fox face a deadly criminal in this action thriller. An FBI agent and Florida State officer team up to investigate a string of unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: The Tree
programme.desc: Four people discover profound truths about their purposes as human beings through their inextricable connections to others. Fear meets hope. Anger meets love. Loss meets meaning.

programme.title: Night Of The Sicario
programme.desc: There is danger at every corner of this thriller. A woman is sucked into a deadly game of cat and mouse when trying to protect a girl whose mom is a witness against a drug cartel.

programme.title: Friday The 13th
programme.desc: A group of teenage camp counsellors attempt to re-open an abandoned summer camp with a tragic past, but they are stalked by a mysterious, relentless killer.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Gary Oldman won the Oscar for his portrayal of iconic British Prime Minister Winston Churchill in this biopic. During WWII, he debates whether to negotiate with Hitler or fight on.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.desc: In a mansion on Long Island, two darlings of New York society host a drunken dinner for the Duchess of Windsor. How did this lead to a night of bloodshed?

programme.title: Chaos In Court

programme.title: Beach Hunters
programme.desc: A family looks for a place where their kids can grow up on the beach. Theyre looking for a waterfront home thats kid-friendly and has space to entertain.

programme.title: Beach Hunters
programme.desc: A woman looks to make the shores of Hampton, Virginia, her permanent home. Originally from San Clemente, California, she misses the beach.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: The minute Dexter entered the house he was out to kill Daisy. Meanwhile, Corey got Giver for Sarahs birthday, but this is one gift hed like to give back.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Andy loves girlfriend Alyssa, but hates her demon cat, Tosh, who turned after he moved in with her. Eric and Kaotars problem cat, Vincent, tries anything to escape.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A couple scours Seattle for a home with a gas range and room for a trampoline. But in this competitive market, finding a home they can afford will be a battle.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A young couple looks for a vintage home without ghosts in Camden, NJ. He would prefer a Colonial with vintage character, but she wants a new construction.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A mother-daughter team debates between a simple bungalow and a charming, vintage Victorian home in downtown Burbank, California.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Engvall requests a Zen-like fish tank for his new office in Hollywood. But a firm weight restriction throws a wrench in his plans.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NBA All-Star John Wall asks ATM to build an aquarium shaped like a giant pair of dice. In Georgia they build a huge lighthouse aquarium for a local seafood restaurant.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: George and Beth are prisoners in their own home due to their vicious kitty Reese. Reese is a cat version of Jack the Ripper and Beth is one of his choice targets.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Marco and Aimee recently got married, but Marcos cat, Monty, is tearing them apart with his appetite for destruction - and will eat everything in sight.

programme.title: Die Babbelbende
programme.desc: n Opvoedkundige kinderprogram in Afrikaans. Paloeka die leeu, Palawa die kameelperd, Bibi en Ben antwoord maats se interessante vrae oor ons wonderlike wereld. Hulle leer ook meer oor woorde en gesegdes, somme en gevoelens.

programme.title: Dorpie-doenlys
